roleset.name: joking, fooling
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, kid-v.01. No VNcls.

example.name: discoursey
example.text: On the matter of new neuron growth , no kidding ? Which neurons ?

example.name: all args
example.text: I know that despite his kidding us that he hadn't had time to prepare his sermon he'd in fact put a lot of thought into it.
example.arg: that he hadn't had time to prepare his sermon
